title: vaaramaina nEthrOthsavamunu
sahitya:
varamaina nEtrOtsavamunu kanukona tarani veDale cUDarE

anupallavi

 dharanu vidhIndrulu kara caramula nirugaDalanu meraya

caraNam 1

 parama bhAgavata cayamulu bAguga hari nAmamu sEya 
duramuna prahlAduDu kanikaramuna hariyani talapOya
   
caraNam 2

 vAridhi rAju nArada sanakAdulu sAreku nutuyimpaga 
vAramu shrI tyAgarAja varadudella vArala gani brOvaga
